b827e3251db9ee6a50647d62c90ba580a4d7bbff21f2bea39e7b2f4a","dweb:/ipfs/QmZiKwtKU1SBX4RGfQtY7PZfiapbbu6SZ9vizGQD9UHjRA"]},"src/DonationManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x88c3e1775e7c055dda85025f0ada49fded2113c635c1e3cfc9c6d2da0fa889e0","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://98f2033e8a44a3b8f40846ef0e619f548fde9bfd117711524ef1da760820b52c","dweb:/ipfs/QmeFDntA88qs18bLHqy6wznHZ6QLQWEvcYsE64xvYrnFXn"]}},"version":1}

constructor.details: Initialize the contract with the USDT token address

params._minDonationAmount: Minimum donation amount in USDT units
params._usdtAddress: The address of the USDT token contract

donate(uint256,string).details: Allow users to donate USDT to the contract for a specific campaign

params.campaignId: The ID of the campaign being donated to

getContractBalance().details: Get the total donations received by the contract

returns._0: The total balance of USDT in the contract

getDonationByDonor(address).details: Get the donation amount for a specific donor

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

recoverToken(address).details: Emergency function to recover tokens sent by mistake

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to recover

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setCampaignManagerContract(address).details: Set the campaign manager contract address

params._campaignManagerContract: The address of the campaign manager contract

setFundDistributorContract(address).details: Set the fund distributor contract address

params._fundDistributorContract: The address of the fund distributor contract

setProofStorageContract(address).details: Set the proof storage contract address

params._proofStorageContract: The address of the proof storage contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferToDistributor(uint256).details: Transfer funds to the fund distributor contract
